name: Eat. Move. Save.
shortDescription: Eat Move Save is a program offered by the University of Illinois Extension that focuses on promoting healthy lifestyle choices related to nutrition, physical activity, and saving money. This website also includes the Find Food IL Community Food Map which locates food pantries and more other resources near the university.

name: Sola Gratia Farm CSA
shortDescription: Sola Gratia Farm offers a Community Supported Agriculture (CSA) program, providing weekly boxes of fresh, organic produce to members during the growing season.

name: Everybody Eats at Bevier Cafe
shortDescription: Seasonal orders, "pay what you can", and more.
